game.name: Best Burger Chef
game.description:
The beautiful yet very talented maid Nin has just opened a new caf√© and wants to prepare some delicious dish for her customers. She has decided to prepare the extremely scrumptious burger. Are you ready girls to help her out in choosing the right tools and cooking the mouth-watering Burger for her beloved customers. Play Best Burger Chef game and get a chance to have fun in unlimited amount! She will be there to assist you when you will explore the tasks of this brand new free online cooking game. 

This fun kitchen game is just for you if you are anxiously looking forward how to prepare the best burger shortly. In restaurants, you will easily find out all the needful equipment to make the final outcomes better than your expectations. After arranging all the tools in the restaurant kitchen, rub the meat with the help of tasty and flavorful spices. Then use a special kind of wood to smoke it perfectly. Clean the fresh vegetables before cutting them in proper shapes. 

Take a pan and pour some oil in it and put it on the stove. Make sure that you have heat up the buns for a while. Then you also have to fry the potato chips on the stove. All the ingredients are ready now. Get ready to create your own burger by adding all the ingredients you ask for: eggs, lettuce, onions, bell peppers, mushrooms, avocado, jalapenos, tomatoes, cheese, sauces, bacon, the smoked meat and the bun. Complete your burger by placing the top bun. You can serve it now with a tasty and refreshing drink.
